attributes.action: To bring back the death penalty
attributes.additional_details: The reason I want the government to do this is because so many cases of death from murder are rising more everyday , innocent people’s lives are being taken for no reason at all and this isn’t fair on their family’s and can mentally have a big impact on them and they have to suffer with the though of loosing a loved one when that person that committed the crime is still out loose or the only punishment they get is jail and that is not enough . Why should the family have to suffer more?
attributes.background: I want the government to get their actions together and make this system more safe and secure so people are more safe where ever they go .

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554914
